Meaning: very dry or having no moisture
Example: He was parched after the long hike.

Meaning: corn crop
Example: Farmers can use large open lands to grow maize during the right season.

Meaning: very hot
Example: The searing sun made the workers look for some shade.

Meaning: dried up; something that has lost vitality or freshness
Example: The withered flowers have lost most of their nice color and scent.

Meaning: easily broken
Example: The branches were dry and brittle, so we easily broke them and started our campfire.

Meaning: to help grow or improve in some way
Example: The farmer works hard to nourish his crops and ensure a bountiful harvest.

Meaning: to operate or turn a handle or lever
Example: I am cranking the bicycle pedal by hand to make sure I fixed the chain correctly.

Meaning: to supply crops with water through a system of pipes, sprinklers, or streams
Example: The farmer irrigated the dry land so he could grow corn.

Meaning: metal that has become orange or reddish brown because it has been exposed to the air and water for a long period of time
Example: My grandfather's old car is very rusted after sitting outside for decades.

Meaning: damaged from over-use, to a point that it can no longer be used
Example: My sneakers are worn-out from running everyday.

Meaning: a person whose job is to join different metal parts together by using heat
Example: My cousin is in training to become a welder so that he can work at a mechanic shop.

Meaning: to raise, lift, or haul up, often using ropes or pulleys
Example: He hoisted the flag to the top of the pole.

Meaning: a person who reviews and examines something carefully
Example: The fire inspector found what caused the house to burn down.

Meaning: a switch or other device that automatically breaks an electric circuit when too much electricity flows through it
Example: The circuit breaker switched on and all of the house's power immediately turned off.

Meaning: to capture or take a picture using a camera or other imaging device
Example: My sister is often photographed because she works as a model.

Meaning: having a high reputation or honor; very important and impressive
Example: The most prestigious award in our school is Student of the Year.

Meaning: a prolonged or enthusiastic episode of applause for someone
Example: The dancers received a standing ovation from the audience after their great performance.

Meaning: a large room where an audience gathers for a presentation or performance
Example: The students gathered in the school auditorium to watch the school assembly.

Meaning: acting in a way that is not too bold, self-assertive or aggressive
Example: Susie modestly explained how she had come up with her new invention.

Meaning: very poor
Example: The impoverished nation is struggling to keep its citizens from starving.

Meaning: to fly or glide in a swift, easy way and at a very great height
Example: The eagle was soaring high above us as we walked along the hiking trail.

Meaning: a machine that looks like a large kite and can be used by people for sailing in the air
Example: When I was on vacation, I had the chance to use a hang glider at the beach.

Meaning: treatment meant to cure a disease or heal an injury
Example: I needed months of physical therapy for my legs after the car accident.

Meaning: having swollen areas on the surface, like bubbles filled with air or liquid
Example: My hands were blistered after playing tug-of-war with my friends all day.

Meaning: to move something
Example: A car with a broken steering wheel would be impossible to maneuver.

Meaning: to put or keep in prison; to not be able to leave a place
Example: He was imprisoned for forty years.

Meaning: to lead someone to act by using reason or argument
Example: The soccer coach persuaded her to try out for the soccer team.

Meaning: to become skilled or knowledgeable in a specific field
Example: My dad specializes in building guitars, so people come from around the world to buy one from him.

Meaning: the best or most skilled
Example: Mozart was an elite pianist who composed many masterpieces.

Meaning: a goal
Example: The objective of a vacation is to relax and do things that you enjoy.

Meaning: made or done in a certain way for a very long time
Example: Kimchi is a traditional food from South Korea.

Meaning: easily understood or clear
Example: The doctor immediately noticed the obvious signs of the disease.

Meaning: operating or working in a way that gets results, with little wasted effort
Example: He is a very efficient worker.

Meaning: a basic law or truth on which action or behavior is based
Example: Our country's laws are based on the principles of liberty and justice.

Meaning: a medical doctor who does surgery
Example: He met the surgeon who was going to operate on his knee.

Meaning: an illness caused by germs
Example: The wound has so far remained free of infection.

Meaning: a person that is getting medical treatment
Example: The doctor asked the patient how long he had been feeling sick.

Meaning: having been suggested as a medicine or treatment, generally by a doctor
Example: The prescribed treatment for the illness was a medication and rest.

Meaning: to release from a place such as a hospital
Example: He was not discharged from the hospital for three weeks.

Meaning: a person, group or company that competes
Example: My sister and I were competitors in the race.

Meaning: (n.) A smell or odor, especially a pleasant one.
Example: The aroma of hot buttered popcorn made our mouths water.

Meaning: (n.) A liquid used as a drink.
Example: When we ordered our beverages, I chose lemonade.

2. (adj.) Hot and moist.

v. To understand.
n. The time during which something lasts or continues.
adj. Easy to see and understand; obvious, clear.

adj. 1. No longer existing or living.

adj. Savage; fierce.
adj. Very large; like a giant in size.

v. To cover up or keep from being seen.
adj. 1. Hard to see; hidden.
